Label: Point Music
Catalog#: 289 464 536-2
Released: 2000
Quality: FLAC


"At first I found this a challenging project, working with a musical heritage I wasn't totaly familiar with. Bachir Attar and I talked about this music,
wich came from Persia to Morocco but wich I feel also has a direct connection with Indian music. I recorded the musicians performing in Jajouka over several nights, keeping the technology to a minimum so they would feel relaxed and their music flow naturally. Then Bachir came to London to work in my studio. Here we tried to capture the energy of the moment while, at the same time, taking the freedom to take the music further without taking away the spirit. I've never imagined the music would come out like this, but it works, and I feel we've achieved a great record." 
Talvin Singh

Master Musicians of Jajouka:
Bachir Attar
Mustapha Attar
Hadj Mohamed Attar
Mohamed Attar Larbi
Amin Attar
Tahir Boukzar
Abdullah Boukzar
Abdullah Attar
Abdullah Attar Sandoui

Moktar Gajhdal
Ahmed Elhamdi

Produced by Talvin Singh
